mapper.insert: insert into bms_st_io_doc (inoutid , trdtlid , printno , printline , credate , comefrom , sourcetable, sourceid , companyid , companyname , keepdate , keepmanid , goodsid , storageid , inoutflag , inqty , outqty , oldqty , goodsunit , goodsweight, usestatus , entryid , preparestatus , placetable , placedtlid , placepointid , memo, grouptable , groupdtlid , groupcustomerid , wmsproflag, gspunconfirmflag, upstatus, rgdtlid,agentid,contactid,ctrltwoinvflag) select inoutid , trdtlid , printno , printline , credate , comefrom , sourcetable, sourceid , companyid , companyname , keepdate , keepmanid , goodsid , storageid , inoutflag , inqty , outqty , oldqty , goodsunit , goodsweight, usestatus , entryid , preparestatus , placetable , placedtlid , placepointid , memo, grouptable , groupdtlid , groupcustomerid , wmsproflag, gspunconfirmflag, upstatus, rgdtlid,agentid,contactid,ctrltwoinvflag from bms_st_io_doc_tmp where inoutid =#{inoutId};
